post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
http://www.kazaa.com
Could download movies which are showing at the theater righnow. Just type the title of the movies and doubleclick to download There are a lot of korean songs too. Very simple setup just like Soribada
My List : Austin Power Signs Road to Perdition Metropolis and many more
Step 1 : go to www.kazaa.com Step 2 : download their client tool Step 3 : Install it and run it
Similar site : www.bearshare.com www.mophius.com
post.title: Movies and MP3 Download Site
